name: TDoV Twine Museum
description:
If you'd like to play a fully visual point-and-click version of this, click HERE.

If you'd like a PDF version of the complete text, scroll down for a download link.

This project was made for the Rainbow Lounge and the LGBTQ+ community of MIT, to celebrate Trans Day of Visibility 2020.

Credits:

  • S. Ayala - writer and Twine-builder
  • Lauryn McNair - Assistant Director of Intercultural Engagement for LBGTQ+ Services
  • Created in Twine

Thank you for visiting!
